name: UIPrinterPickerController
desc: A view controller that displays the standard interface for selecting a printer.

items.name: init(initiallySelectedPrinter: UIPrinter?)
items.desc: Creates and returns a printer picker with an initially selected printer object.

items.name: var delegate: UIPrinterPickerControllerDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate for the printer picker controller.

items.name: protocol UIPrinterPickerControllerDelegate
items.desc: A set of methods for managing the presentation and dismissal of a printer picker interface.

items.name: func present(animated: Bool, completionHandler: UIPrinterPickerController.CompletionHandler?) -> Bool
items.desc: Presents the picker from a view controller of your app.

items.name: func present(from: UIBarButtonItem, animated: Bool, completionHandler: UIPrinterPickerController.CompletionHandler?) -> Bool
items.desc: Present the picker in a popover that is anchored to the specified bar button item.

items.name: func present(from: CGRect, in: UIView, animated: Bool, completionHandler: UIPrinterPickerController.CompletionHandler?) -> Bool
items.desc: Present the picker in a popover that is anchored to a rectangle in the specified view.

items.name: typealias UIPrinterPickerController.CompletionHandler
items.desc: The completion handler to execute when dismissing a printer picker controller.
